Activity: Check emails and company communication channels. Follow up on my previous email to @LPRO-1, @LDES-1, @PROD-1 regarding weekly priorities if I haven't received a response yet.
Present the character customization prototype to the team (@LPRO-1, @LDES-1, @3DMOD-1, @3DMOD-2, @UIUX-1). Gather feedback and discuss potential improvements. Take detailed notes on the discussion.
Based on the team's feedback, identify key areas for improvement in the character customization system. Prioritize tasks based on their impact on gameplay and visual quality.

Implement the first round of improvements to the character customization system. Focus on addressing the most critical issues raised during the team presentation, such as performance bottlenecks or visual artifacts.
Lunch Break: Grab a quick sandwich and watch a YouTube video on advanced shader techniques.
Continue refining the character customization system. Explore different options for handling character clothing and armor, such as using modular meshes or cloth simulation.
Work with @UIUX-1 to integrate the character customization system into the game's UI. Define the user interface elements and functionality required for players to customize their characters.

Test the integrated character customization system with the game's UI. Identify any usability issues or bugs and report them to the UI/UX designer. @UIUX-1 Issue reports for UI/UX in custom character system.
Document the changes made to the character customization system and update the team on the progress. Prepare a new build for testing.
